Yes, here are some tips to create visually appealing course content on a budget:

1. Use Canva: Canva is a great tool for creating visual content for your course. It offers a wide range of templates, images, and design elements that you can use to make your course content visually appealing.

2. Utilize free stock images: There are many websites that offer free stock images that you can use in your course content. Some great sources of free images include Unsplash, Pexels, and Pixabay.

3. Use PowerPoint: PowerPoint is a great tool for creating slide decks that you can use in your course. You can create visually appealing slides by using templates, images, and icons that are available within the application.

4. Keep it simple: Simple designs are often the most effective. Use a simple color palette and clean typography to make your content easy to read and visually appealing.

5. Use white space effectively: White space is the area around the content on the page that is left empty. Effective use of white space can help to draw attention to important elements on the page and make your content more visually appealing.

6. Create Custom Graphics: Tools like Recieva allow users to create custom graphic banners for free which can be very engaging for learner

By implementing these tips and using free or low-cost design tools, you can create visually appealing course content without breaking the bank.
